data.eml:eml: Jocquestus, a new genus of trachelid sac spiders from the Afrotropical Region (Arachnida: Araneae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lyle, Robin, Haddad, Charles R. (2018): Jocquestus, a new genus of trachelid sac spiders from the Afrotropical Region (Arachnida: Araneae). Zootaxa 4471 (2): 309-333, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4471.2.4
